summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5565 for the improvement of 45th Avenue Northeast, from East 38th Street to East 40th Street; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 72428, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
